patient_identifier_type.name: ZL EMR ID
patient_identifier_type.description: A unique identifier issued to all patients by the ZL EMR. Blocks of this identifier are issued to each site to prevent duplication, so the identifier is unique across all sites. The identifier uses six digits and is alphanumeric base 30, omitting the letters B, I, O, Q, S and Z as these can be confused with 8, 1, 0, 0, 5 and 2.

location_tag.name: Visit Location
location_tag.description: Visits are only allowed to happen at locations tagged with this location tag or at locations that descend from a location tagged with this tag.
